Comment.val: 02.08.2011 SH SCR16101 BXA023 is using function MG_INCLUDE which give probelms in Katowice because of permission settings of directory \MAGICCTL (no write permission) where Unipaas stores temorary XML files for MG_INCLUDE function. BXA023 is not used in production. So if BXA023 is reactivated again in the future, the program has to be changed to get rid of MG_INCLUDE.

Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
INFO: The described selection (see SPECS) has to be executed two times
1. To print all selected lines to XML
2. To update the SCHT_LAWYERPAID with 'Y' after handling one group
(If the selection has to be changed, do it in all two tasks)
25.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
26.07.2012 GB SCR17464 Replaced UFB525 MagicConcat by GB730 AppendFile to build the final XML
01.08.2011 SH SCR16635 Extended SCHI_INVNO to alpha 20 for sort on SCHI
24.03.2011 GB SCR116261 Replaced the GB002 by the GB902
06.05.2006 SH SCR11159 Disabled fax/paper for BXA900 parameters
04.01.2005 SH SCR10001 BXA023B Changed update of TMPL_LEDG_NO, first TMPL row
01.12.2005 JJ SCR9641 023B LAWL_LEDGERNO instead of SCHT_LAWY_LAWYER if found
03.05.2005 SH SCR8263 BXA023B Uses LAWY_BDET_ID > 0 to trigger storing
of PAIN, uses also BDET rows to update PAIN fields now
05.01.2005 SH SCR7608 Added new field PAIN_AUTOCOLLSTORNO, init with 'N'
25.08.2004 SH SCR6889 Skip BXA023A - BXA023G if there is nothing to pay to
lawyer, see new task "Something to pay for lawyer"
30.07.2004 SH SCR6693 BXA023B Added storing of PAIN_IBAN with LAWY_IBAN
04.03.2004 SH SCR5564 Changed argument list for BXA900, see SCR for details
09.02.2004 SH SCR5378 Added new argument to BXA900 PI.ATTACHMENT_NAME (skip)
23.01.2004 SH SCR5154 BXA023A Added new fields where REPA will be stored
11.12.2003 SH SCR4925 Added new argument to BXA900 PI.ENCODING with 0
07.10.2003 SH SCR4474 Replaced HOFF_HADR_CITY by HOFF_CITYONLETTERS
12.06.2003 SH SCR3743 BXA023B Repaced hardcoded ADMNO selections by
- SCHT_ADMNOGLPACKAGE
26.05.2003 SH SCR3617 Reduced selection of SCHI rows with SCHI_INVDELETED = 'N'
14.05.2003 SH SCR3373 Switch reprot language to lawyer language for the diff.
- lawyers
24.03.2003 SH SCR3206 If a new PAIN row was stored also a new PAID row will be
- stored now
11.03.2003 SH SCR2566 Added to new arguments for GB007 if job is running on
- AS400 to turn job to message wait
26.02.2003 SH SCR3065 Fixed problems with last page (empty page was printed)
21.02.2003 SH SCR3059 Added new part (cover sheet) if LAWY_FAX <> ''
- BXA023D_SUBHEADER
18.02.2003 JJ SCR2988 additional inits TMPL
05.02.2003 SH SCR2942 Extende storing of PAIN with PAIN_APPROVED,
- PAIN_DATEROWADDED and PAIN_BTCH_ID
03.02.2003 SH SCR2914 Extended sequence with SCHT_ADMNOGLPACKAGE
18.12.2002 SH SCR2720 BXA023B Added new field PAIN_ADMNO_DEBTOR and
- init with 4 and also init TMPL_ADMNO with 4 instead of 1 as before
11.12.2002 SH SCR2683 Changed updates --> PAIN_BANKCOUNTRY =
- LAWY_ADRCOUNTRY and PAIN_AMOUNTCOSTSTODEDUCT = 0
10.12.2002 SH Removed hardcode REPA_ADMNO = 4 and REPA_CLNTNO = 99999
- now we get no problems with XML-Standard, if both fields are zero, before we
- got the message that an element of the highest level was missing, I can't
- explain why, but now it worked fine
26.11.2002 SH SCR2576 Add new columns and groupbreak to report
20.08.2003 Jin SCR4110 add PAIN_TYPE = 2
-- Path and Filenames for Templates and Outputfiles
-- needed for errorhandling
-- 38 lines for landscape with fontsize = 9 (+ 5 Headerlines) means totally 43
-- lines which could be printed to XML per page
-- Globale virtuals
======= Build directories for TEMPLATES and OUTPUTDIRECTORIES =========
-- Use PI.OUTDIR as OutputDirectory for XML Files
-- Get directories and convert them to OS Format (Windows/AS400)
-- Directory for templates
-- Directory for temporary XML Files
-- Build FileNames for Templates
-- 1. STEP --> Check for existing Template (s)
-- 2. STEP --> Check for existing TempDirectory
-- PC Message (Online)
-- AS400 Message (Batch)
-- Start producing XML File if no error occurs
-- Totals per LAWYER/CURRENCY
-- Subtotals per SCHT_DATENTERED
-- Variable fields which used in BXA023E for pagetitel
-- Column Headings used in BXA023E
-- Only is there is something to pay to the lawyer, XML has to be produced and
database updates have to be performed, else skip the lawyer
(see task "Something to pay for lawyer")
-- If min. for one selected SCHI_INVURRENCY XML was produced, perfrom update
on SCHT level
-- Reset variables
-- Switch to lawyer language
-- Textfields which used in BXA023E for pagetitel
-- Initialze Columnheadings for BXA023E
-- Update SCHT_LAWYWEPAID = 'Y' and close transaction, see properties
(The status SCHT_LAWYERPAID will be set to 'Y' in a separate task, because this
current task is only a QUERY TASK without database modifications. This structure
is more modular but if the performance is to bad, then we have to change the
structure --> ATTENTION: The relation between table SCHT and SCHI is normally
one-to-many, but in BXA023 we do not use this structure, see WHERE-CLAUSE
and so it's a bit difficult to set the SCHT_LAWYERPAID to 'Y', we have to use
same SELECT to handle SCHT_LAWYERPAID --> See BXA023G)
-- Check if there is something to pay for the lawyer. If not skip lawyer, do not
generate XML and perform database updates
-- Reset virtuals
-- Initialze virtuals
-- Build filenames for temporary XML Files
-- Build final filename for the XML File
-- First PAGE
-- Close CDATA-Section of last produced page
-- Perform updates to database and build XML-File
-- Relevant in G.S. SCHT_LAWY_LAWYER to perform updates on SCHT
-- Reset virtuals
-- if a Subtotal-Line was printed, we have to add 3 to v.Counter, means the page
-- skip has to be executed earlier
-- Use special counter per page, counter(1) can not be used because it's the
-- counter over all rows which have to be printed
-- Calculate totals
-- Second and following pages --> Begin new page after 38 lines, if
-- bankdetails have to be printed at the end of the report we have to minimize
-- the max. lines per page with 3, because 2 additional lines have to be printed
-- at the end and 1 line will be used by SOFTWARE AG at the end
-- Close CDATA-Section of previous page, Set a <page-skip/> to produce a new pag
-- New page --> add 1
-- New page --> begin with 1 for new page
-- Open CDATA-Section of the new page and print Pageheader and Columnheader
-- informations
-- Print each selecetd line
-- Don't change the sequence of the output forms, because the parent task
-- sometimes will be called this task to print more than one output form

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('Above mentoined amount has been transferred today to bankaccount:')&' '&IF ({2,27}=0,'',Trim (Str ({2,27},'9')))&' / '&Trim ({2,28})

-- Store row to Report Archive and Payment Instructions
-- BXA023C --> Build XML Header and footer
-- BXA023D Produce XML-Header
-- Produce final XML-File
-- Copy final XML File to tamino queue
-- Copy of final XML File failed
-- PC Message (Online)
-- AS400 Message (Batch)
-- Only if FinalFile was copied to TaminoQueue by UFB523
-- Get ADML_LEDGERNO used to store first TMPL row
-- Get ADML_LEDGERNO used to store second TMPL row
-- Get PAIN_ID
-- Get v.RUNNUMBER
-- Recalculate PAIN_AMOUNT to GNRL_CURRENCY
-- Perform temporary ledger bookings
... prepare contents of TMPL_LEDGER_NO for first TMPL row
- Perform final ledger bookings

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('Please find as annex the following information:')

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT cast(sum(SCHI_INVAMOUNTI) as decimal(18,2)) FROM :1/schi, :1/scht WHERE SCHI_SCHT_NO = SCHT_NO AND SCHT_ADMNOGLPACKAGE= :2 AND SCHT_LAWY_LAWYER = :3 AND SCHT_BOOKED = 'Y' AND (SCHT_LAWYERPAID is null OR SCHT_LAWYERPAID = 'N') AND SCHI_INVDELETED = 'N' AND SCHI_INVCURRENCY = ':4' FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

Text.val: -- Init variable
-- Do not generate XML and perform database updates if there is nothing to pay
for the lawyer
